thread.title: Morning Technical Insight on These Printed Circuit Boards Stocks -- Flex, TTM Technologies, Celestica, and Jabil

author: cnbc.com
title: Morning Technical Insight on These Printed Circuit Boards Stocks -- Flex, TTM Technologies, Celestica, and Jabil
text:
NEW YORK, Jan. 30, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on FLEX, TTMI, CLS, and JBL which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . The global Printed Circuit Boards market is expected to reach an estimated $72.6 billion by 2022 and is forecast to grow at a CAGR of 3.2% from 2017 to 2022, according to research by ReportLinker. The major drivers of growth for this market are the strong demand for smart phones and tablets, along with growing automation in industries, such as Automotive and Aerospace & Defense, the report further noted. Ahead of today's trading session, WallStEquities.com scans the following stocks: Flex Ltd (NASDAQ: FLEX), TTM Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: TTMI), Celestica Inc. (NYSE: CLS), and Jabil Inc. (NYSE: JBL). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Flex Ltd
Singapore-based Flex Ltd's shares saw a decline of 2.53%, finishing Monday's trading session at $18.86. A total volume of 10.22 million shares was traded, which was higher than their three months average volume of 3.33 million shares. In the last month and the previous three months, the stock has advanced 5.90% and 8.70%, respectively. Additionally, the Company's shares have gained 17.88% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 2.12% and 10.25%, respectively. Moreover, shares of Flex have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 49.98.
On January 08 th , 2018, Flex announced that Jennifer Li, a seasoned, global international executive with extensive experience in China, automotive, and multiple technology sectors, has been appointed to the Company's Board of Directors. Ms. Li currently serves as CEO and General Managing Director of Baidu Capital, the investment arm of Baidu Inc.
On January 26 th , 2018, research firm Needham reiterated its 'Buy' rating on the Company's stock with an increase of the target price from $19 a share to $21 a share. Get the full research report on FLEX for free by clicking below at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=FLEX
TTM Technologies
On Monday, shares in California headquartered TTM Technologies Inc. recorded a trading volume of 921,177 shares and ended the session 0.41% higher at $16.97. The stock has gained 8.50% in the last month, 9.13% over the previous three months, and 15.05% over the past year. The Company's shares are trading 3.15% above their 50-day moving average and 4.75% above their 200-day moving average. Furthermore, TTM Technologies' stock has an RSI of 51.71.
On January 16 th , 2018, TTM Technologies will release its Q4 2017 financial results on February 07 th , 2018, after the market closes. The Company will host a conference call at 4:30 p.m. ET that same day to discuss its quarterly performance. This call will be simulcast on the Company's website. To experience our free membership services anytime/ anywhere and access the free report on TTMI, click to register at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=TTMI
Celestica
Shares in Canada headquartered Celestica Inc. closed at $10.51, slightly down 0.38% from the last trading session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.20 million shares, which was above its three months average volume of 866,870 shares. The Company's shares have gained 0.48% in the last month. The stock is trading 1.59% below its 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Celestica have an RSI of 40.63.
On January 25 th , 2018, Celestica announced that its Annual General Shareholders' Meeting will be held on April 27 th , 2018, at 9:30 a.m. EDT at One King West Hotel, 1 King Street West Toronto, Ontario. Celestica also announced that it has set March 09 th , 2018, as the record date for determining shareholders of the Company who are entitled to receive notice of, and to vote at, the meeting. Shareholders should expect to receive the Company's proxy statement and related materials in late March. Join our big investor community at Wall St. Equities today and get your free report on CLS at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CLS
Jabil
Florida headquartered Jabil Inc.'s stock ended 2.15% lower at $25.96 with a total trading volume of 2.49 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 8.71% over the past year. The stock is trading below its 50-day moving average by 6.51%. Furthermore, shares of Jabil, which provides electronic manufacturing services and solutions worldwide, have an RSI of 36.14.
On January 25 th , 2018, Jabil announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.08 per share of common stock to shareholders of record as of February 15 th , 2018. The dividend is payable on March 01 st , 2018. Know more about JBL in our free research coverage at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=JBL
--
